ON articles(category) 
WHERE status = 'published';

indexes.name: idx_articles_difficulty_category
indexes.columns:
difficulty_level, category) 
WHERE status = 'published';

-- Full-text search indexes for articles
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_articles_search_en 
ON articles USING GIN(to_tsvector('english', 
  COALESCE(title->>'en', '') || ' ' || 
  COALESCE(content->>'en', '') || ' ' || 
  COALESCE(meta_description->>'en', '')
)

indexes.name: idx_articles_engagement
indexes.columns:
view_count DESC, like_count DESC, published_at DESC) 
WHERE status = 'published';
